abilities.name: Breath
about: Creates a channeling beam that does constant damage at player location

abilities.name: Takeoff
about: Encounter goes airborne. After short period of time encounter slams to the ground

abilities.name: Cleave
about: Swings weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging enemies in an area in front of them

abilities.name: Summon Parasites on Death
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter
